channel.title: Enso RSPS - Looking someone for 'owner' position!
channel.description:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52228169/storage_media/logo_enso.png[/img]
I'm looking a mature person who is social and can handle even bigger community without issues.
[b]Requirements[/b]
[ul][li]Skype Dedication towards the server Mature age (18+) Trustable You are able to give tasks to do for development team (such a important bug fixes). You are able to speak good english.[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]OPTIONAL THAT IS A GOOD PLUS[/b] You have previous experience
[ul][li]Java knowledge Understanding how advertising works HTML/PHP knowledge[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
If you pass all I recommend to submit a apply to my Skype fuzen.seth The reason why we need someone for the 'owner' position is that I simply cannot cut myself to server owner and a dedicated developer at the same time.
Enso is based on 2011 (667/667 revision) RS and stacked with unique content. I have only project thread on RuneLocus which is a shame but here is some images below:
[img]http://puu.sh/nIqzr/b382fbb189.jpg[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2mq86kn.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4hsQm.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/ouZcD/abc2e06536.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/ouZ3u/a51ab5cb3a.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/oEWeL/89b0867055.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/oECJ8/38eb03f667.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/obG5d/272441ebca.png[/img]
If you're interested to see more I recommend you check it out on RuneLocus located at the project thread section. [/center]

item.title: Enso RSPS - Looking someone for 'owner' position!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

It’s nice to still see that you’re doing the development for the server (I assume it’s the same thing from so long ago), but instead of requesting an owner, why not a community manager instead that would work under you? It’s really not that big of a deal, but I’m only saying.

Read full topic
item.source: Enso RSPS - Looking someone for 'owner' position!

item.title: Enso RSPS - Looking someone for 'owner' position!
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

[center]

I’m looking a mature person who is social and can handle even bigger community without issues.

Requirements

[ul][li]Skype
Dedication towards the server
Mature age (18+)
Trustable
You are able to give tasks to do for development team (such a important bug fixes).
You are able to speak good english.[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

OPTIONAL THAT IS A GOOD PLUS
You have previous experience

[ul][li]Java knowledge
Understanding how advertising works
HTML/PHP knowledge[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

If you pass all I recommend to submit a apply to my Skype fuzen.seth
The reason why we need someone for the ‘owner’ position is that I simply cannot cut myself to server owner and a dedicated developer at the same time.

Enso is based on 2011 (667/667 revision) RS and stacked with unique content. I have only project thread on RuneLocus which is a shame but here is some images below:


2mq86kn.png764×502






If you’re interested to see more I recommend you check it out on RuneLocus located at the project thread section.
[/center]
